mapper.select: SELECT * FROM deployment WHERE status not in ("DONE", "CANCELED")
SELECT * FROM deployment WHERE status not in ("DONE", "CANCELED") OR last_update > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR)
SELECT * FROM deployment WHERE last_update > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 HOUR)

SELECT ver.git_commit_sha FROM deployment as dep JOIN deployable_version as ver ON dep.deployable_version_id = ver.id WHERE dep.service_id = #{serviceId} AND dep.environment_id = #{environmentId} AND dep.status = "DONE" ORDER BY dep.last_update DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deployment (environment_id, service_id, deployable_version_id, user_email, status, source_version, group_name, deployment_params, deployment_message) VALUES (#{environmentId}, #{serviceId}, #{deployableVersionId}, #{userEmail}, #{status}, #{sourceVersion}, #{groupName}, #{deploymentParams}, #{deploymentMessage})
mapper.update: UPDATE deployment SET environment_id=#{environmentId}, service_id=#{serviceId}, deployable_version_id=#{deployableVersionId}, user_email=#{userEmail}, status=#{status}, source_version=#{sourceVersion}, group_name=#{groupName}, deployment_params=#{deploymentParams}, deployment_message=#{deploymentMessage} WHERE id=#{id}
